content:
Sometimes it would be helpful to be able to specify a base commit for try to use so that we can do 3-way comparisons when testing perf.

I.e. do a try + timer. Then modify something and then tell try to use the same base commit again so the results of the two different attempts are comparable.
generally speaking, 'just' needs a bors PR (or to finish work on making rust-timer able to invoke rustc CI)
